name: South Carolina-Style Mustard Sauce
keywords: jalapeño, mustard, white vinegar, side dish
recipeIngredient: 1/2 cup yellow mustard or Dijon-style mustard
1/4 cup honey mustard or brown deli-style mustard
1/4 cup light corn syrup (or to taste)

recipeInstructions.text: Combine all ingredients in saucepan, and bring to boil. Reduce heat, and simmer until thick and richly flavored, about 10 minutes, stirring occasionally. Taste for seasoning, adding additional salt or corn syrup as desired. This sauce goes great with just about anything.
